short_summary: Provide caretaker and maintenance services at Veterans Cemetery in Esquimalt, BC
description: Veterans Affairs Canada (VAC) has a requirement for the provision of caretaker and maintenance services at Veterans Cemetery in Esquimalt, BC.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** Caretaker and Maintenance Services
**Language:** English
**Reference Number:** CB-726-71279681
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 3000771 803B
**Publication Date:** June 5, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** June 10, 2024, 1:00 PM PST

## Background

Veterans Affairs Canada (VAC) is seeking proposals for the provision of caretaker and maintenance services at the Veterans Cemetery in Esquimalt, British Columbia.

## Procurement Details

### Description of Services
The successful proponent will be responsible for providing caretaker and maintenance services, including landscaping, irrigation, and other related activities, to ensure the cemetery and grounds are well-maintained.

### Procurement Method
This procurement is being conducted through a competitive, open bidding process.

### Selection Criteria
The contract will be awarded to the proponent who submits the lowest price proposal.

### Tender Documents

The complete tender documents can be accessed at the following link:

[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39559/npp---3000771803b.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39559/npp---3000771803b.pdf)

**Contact Information**

* Lynn Paulin, 
	+ Email: [lynn.paulin@veterans.gc.ca](mailto:lynn.paulin@veterans.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (782) 377-4105
	+ Fax: None
